plot outline: Vachathi is a 2012 Indian Tamil film, directed by Ravi Thambi and produced by Rethna Ramesh. The film stars Rethna Ramesh, Tharushana, YG Mahendran, Kuyili, Nellai Siva and Balu Anand in lead roles. The film had musical score by Jack Vathsan.
title: Vachathi
plot: _Vachathi_ (qv) is a 2012 Indian Tamil film, directed by Ravi Thambi and produced by Rethna Ramesh. The film stars Rethna Ramesh, Tharushana, YG Mahendran, Kuyili, Nellai Siva and Balu Anand in lead roles. The film had musical score by Jack Vathsan.
